message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $120. I think it's a great deal considering its value to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your offer, but I can't go that low.  How about we meet in the middle at $105?  I'm confident this product will be worth it to you.
I understand your compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go that high. How about we try $95? I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think that's the highest I can go.
